data.title: Formula 1 Wiki
data.meta_description: This is about the original Lotus team, which ran from 1958 to 1994. For the team previously called Lotus (now known as Caterham), see Lotus Racing, and for the team known as Lotus from 2012 to 2015, see Lotus F1. Team Lotus was the motorsport sister company of Lotus Cars. They are the fourth...
